\documentclass{article}
\usepackage{chemarr}
\begin{document}
\begin{center}
  left
  \xrightleftharpoons[\text{below}]{\text{above}}
  right
\end{center}
\[
  A
  \xrightleftharpoons[T \geq 400\,\mathrm{K}]{p > 10\,\mathrm{hPa}}
  B
\]
\end{document}
\endinput
